issue.title: [JS] Table.from fails for zero-item Lists, FixedSizeLists, Maps. ditto Table.empty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9479](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9479). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
deserializing zero-item tables (as generated by Table.empty or, in this case, pyarrow.Schema.serialize) with a schema containing a List, FixedList or Map fail due to an unconditional 
```java

new Data(/* preceding parameters */ buffers, [childData])
```
statement, the childData parameter resolves to  [undefined] rather than the desired [].

 See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7771> for further details.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9479?focusedCommentId=17214917) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7771
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7771>
